products.title: Splash Tropez Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash tropez has an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. Their vertical blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which provides extra peace of mind that you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Duck Egg 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg vertical blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a go to for kitchens and bathrooms. Their vertical blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chrome control chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window.

products.title: Splash Ruby Red 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash ruby red is a saturated red vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this red vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Hessian
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
